mapper.insert: insert into tbl_contacts (id, owner, source, appellation, fullName, email, job, mphone, description, country, province, city, street, zipcode, birth, customerId, createBy, createTime, contactSummary) values (#{id},#{owner},#{source},#{appellation},#{fullName},#{email},#{job},#{mphone},#{description},#{country},#{province},#{city},#{street},#{zipcode},#{birth},#{customerId},#{createBy},#{createTime},#{contactSummary})
